comments.body: Yeah, this fixes the weird compile error (Arrays + generic types are stricter in Scala 2.13) though I don't directly see what it has to do with type M. Still, this is an API change I think MiMa will fail and I think I need another workaround for _that_. This is an obscure method that isn't even called by tests, AFAICT, so not sure it even has coverage.
